title: Prez urges all to reject moves to push people towards racial disharmony
body_lines: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has urged all Sri Lankans to reject the subversive attempts to push people towards racial and religious disharmony.
He said in a twitter messege that "This is the time that all Sri Lankans join hands as one, to overcome the economic, social and political challenges.
"I urge all Sri Lankans to reject the subversive attempts to push you towards racial and religious disharmony. Promoting moderation, toleration and coexistence is vital," he tweeted.
